{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04194v1", "title": "Some dynamical properties of constrained Modified Swift-Hohenberg
  Equation", "summary": "In this paper, we have studied the long-term behavior for the projected
deterministic constrained modified Swift-Hohenberg equation with constraints
and Dirichlet boundary conditions. Specifically, using Lojasiewicz-Simon
inequality, we have shown that the global solution approaches an equilibrium
state. Also, we have analyzed the rate at which the solution approaches
equilibrium. Finally, we have proven the existence of a global attractor.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,math.DS", "published": "2025-05-07T07:47:52Z"}
